sourceString: Local transmission is established in many countries in all major inhabited regions of the world except some Pacific island nations.
targetString: D6p nath kv rs rvi w55n5kivn cuv tussk rvi w55n5 t5 xuan tin civx naath kv w55 mu]]n v thil n5 dhu]]l Pathipik k`rsa.

sourceString: (See updates from the WHO.)
targetString: (Guic l``r in pay tussk k` WHO.)

sourceString: The full extent of the spread is uncertain, due in part to limited testing.
targetString: Pek in c5 juey v cop kv thi1xdv kv fsw /ca jv x`c v com, kv thil th2m m5 gsaa kv th11xdv.

sourceString: Many countries are experiencing a severe shortage of test kits, and the authorities have not been able to test everybody who is at high risk, so the real number of cases is probably much higher than the official one.
targetString: W55 t5 xuan kvn cuc kv kv dak kuakn5 th2m, k` kuumvn5 /k1n jv lu`x kv f66 ba naath diaal thvm tin thieek kv rivk, kv ku5c vms pek in thu]k in cv moc juey d]x d5t n5 jvn k` pek in ca lar.

sourceString: Countries also differ in their testing and reporting practices, so comparisons of the number of reported cases do not tell the full story of how the epidemic has progressed in different areas.
targetString: W55 b` te kvn kv d``k kv th2mdivn kv naath kvn th7p l``r`, kv f66 ns p``r kv pek in ca thvm kvn pek in ca lar /cv jv nyoth kv gu11thdv vn min tussk v puc kv ku5c ju1th kv wedv nhiam rvi w55n5 t5 g66l.

sourceString: The virus is transmitted through respiratory droplets and through objects.
targetString: Vn bayr`th dsap kv jv kv pusw-pussw tin la be raar thik raam m5 ruac kvn xsak tin pvn kv th5n.

sourceString: The coronavirus is a relatively large virus, meaning it is not truly airborne: it will settle down in respiratory droplets.
targetString: Vn ksrsnabayr`th v bayr`thn m5 lvm, m5 lotn5 f66 jvn /cv tussk rvi jsam: jvn la nyuurv rvi ruvvn5 tin cv p00n kv kv kvvl.

sourceString: Staying two metres (six feet) away from other people is usually enough to prevent transmission through this route.
targetString: Cu]x kv kam m5 cet kv m5t5r5 rvw (k11th ci7k` d1x 6) v n1n kv naath tin k]x derv j5 lu1k kv g1x kv f66 /c5 juey b5 dsp.

sourceString: Transmission from objects can happen, for example, if someone sneezes, touches a doorknob, and then other people touch the doorknob and then touch their faces.
targetString: D6p ju1th k` xsak tin cv pvn th5n, c``t, m5 c5 raan thiam, cv leep baap gu22r, k` cv lv jssc 5 c5 naath k]kivn jv lvn ben thiap k` ba nhiamdivn lv we gu22r.

sourceString: The SARS-CoV-2 virus may last on cardboard for up to 24 hours and on plastic for up to 3 days.
targetString: Vn SARS-CoV-2 bayr`th la t22 th5n kv vn w1ns kv thaakn5 t5 24 k` thanduk jiaath, k` bv te k` pil11thik kv n5n di]k.

sourceString: Transmission via the fecal–oral route may also be possible.
targetString: D6pdv kv c`th kvn thok jscv cet kv m5 kuiyv.

sourceString: Evidence suggests that COVID-19 is contagious even without symptoms, though to what extent is still being investigated.
targetString: Nyooth m5 ca nvnv vn f66 COVID-19 la dspv naath c1x thilv nyuuthn5 t5 tussk, c`x min xotv d22 lustdv kulv g7r vn gu11th in pekv th5n.

sourceString: Common symptoms include a fever, dry cough, and fatigue.
targetString: Nyuuthn5 kvn nhiam kv kvn l2th pi11ny, kivl m5 thil k`k kvn b0v pu11ny.

sourceString: Other less common symptoms include shortness of breath, a sore throat, headache, muscle pain, or sputum production.
targetString: Nyuuthn5 tin k]x tin dak-dak kv vkn civk yieek`, kuuk l55k`, bak wec, b0c r``l kiv ben thuny`.

sourceString: Some patients have very mild symptoms, similar to a cold.
targetString: Th11x nath tin cv k`p la moocv kv nyuuthn5 t5 thil, t5 cet nyin thony-thony`.

sourceString: Serious complications include pneumonia, acute respiratory distress syndrome, and multi-organ failure leading to disability or death.
targetString: Tin ji`k tin la n77xv kv pneumonia, nyuuthn5 kuuk` l55k` m5 rup-rup, kv thil l1t cu]]xn5 pu11ny t5 g66l t5 d22 li11 n66x.

sourceString: About 80% of infections result in mild symptoms, while the remaining may result in hospitalization.
targetString: Pek m5 cet kv 80% k` luex cv tussk kv nyuuthn5 t5 thil, k` tin k]x jak` naath k` f66 ba ts11c du22lwal.

sourceString: Case fatality rate is estimated at 1-3% of infected individuals, most of whom are elderly with underlying health conditions.
targetString: Pek lieth ca jv guic cet kv m5 r`thv k` 1-3% k` naath tin cv k`p, t5 r5wdivn kv dsx t5 te kv ju1th k]kivn n5 wen kiv rikv pusl` pu11ny.

sourceString: The fatality rate is much higher for those over 70 but significantly lower for those under 40.
targetString: Pek lieth d5tn5 jvn k` naath tin b``l runkivn 70 duxdv f66 kuiyv k` tin pek runkivn k` 40.

sourceString: Those most at risk of COVID-19 infection and serious complications are the elderly and those with weakened immune systems or underlying health conditions like cardiovascular disease, diabetes, hypertension, chronic respiratory disease, and cancer.
targetString: Naath tin thieek kv rivk ju1th COVID-19 kvn ji`k tin la n77xv kv dsx kvn tin cv cuit n5 wen kv ju1th pusl` pu11ny k]kivn cet kv ju1th lsaac, juey thok22r, d5t rivm, juey l55k` m5 c5 j``ny kv k1nth00r.

sourceString: Not many cases are reported in children and most of these are mild or moderate, though a significant fraction do get pneumonia.
targetString: Thivlv pek ju1th m5 d55t m5 caa lat k` dh7l5 k` kvn tit kuiy b0cdivn kiv p``rv, c`xn5 ms la pek m5 r7x n5musnia v jeks.

sourceString: Occupationally, health care workers have higher risk compared to others with clusters of disease among workers and in health care settings.
targetString: Kv ciaax l1t, l11t du2l w1l kv kvn dee juey kv mal k`ps m5 p11r kvkv kv bu]n ju1thn5 tin k]kivn5 tin te rvy l11tn5 kvnv gu`th du2l5 wal.

sourceString: The time between being exposed to the virus and the emergence of symptoms (incubation period) is typically between 2 and 14 days, though there has been one reported case in China where symptoms appeared 27 days after exposure.
targetString: Gu11th in te kam jek` ran kvv b1yr]th kvnv p`l nyuuthn5 (inkub2cin p5r56t) la malv t22 kam n5n5 2 kvnv 14, c`xn5 ms t22 kv l``r kvl m5 caa th0p k` Cvyna 5 c5 nyuuthn5 ju1th we p`l kv ksr n5n5 27 kv ksr jek` ran kv juey.

sourceString: As of February 2020, the period of infectiousness is unknown, but is likely most significant when people are symptomatic.
targetString: Kv t11 paay rvw 2020, /caa pek gu1th in dsp jey naath kv jv ca x`c, duxdv h66 laa rivvrv v l7x m5 te raan kv nyuuthn5.

sourceString: There is evidence of transmission from people who don't have symptoms, although to what extent is still being investigated.
targetString: T22 kv xsaan5 t5 nyoothv 5 d22 juey dsp k` ram5 thivl nyuuthn5, c`xn5 ms xotv kuaalv g6r5 lustdv ms vn h66 deraa pek m5 n5n d5.

sourceString: It is unclear whether it is possible to be reinfected with the virus after recovering from it the first time around.
targetString: /Caa jv x`c vgsaa m5 dee b1yr]th raan k`p v nysk kv ksr k` min c5 raan x]]th kv gu11th in nhiam.

sourceString: Long-term effects for people who have recovered remain unclear, but there is evidence of reduced lung capacity in some recovered patients.
targetString: Min n77x jueyv kv pek m5 b``r k` nvy tin c5 x]]th xotv /k1nv n5 x1c, duxdv h66 t22 kv xsaan5 t5 nyoothv 5 xook lu1x l1t pu]]thrs k` j5 ju1thn5 tin c5 x]]th.

sourceString: Testing for the virus usually consists of a swab inserted through the nose or a throat swab which is analysed in a laboratory for the virus.
targetString: Th2m b1yr]th` gu`thn5 t5 xuan laa lath v custkv wuum ran kiv r7lv k` baa b1yr]th we g7r rvydv k` lab.

sourceString: The current "gold standard" test involves extracting the genetic material from the sample and analysing it for known genetic markers of the virus.
targetString: “Teem in gsaa” kv gu11th t`mvk` v h66 baa j55n b1yr]th` k1m raar kv min waa thvm k` baa j55n5 b1yr]th` t5 x1ckv n5 wen g7r th5n.

sourceString: There is no established test assessing for the virus or antibodies in the blood, although tests are being developed.
targetString: Thivlv theem m5 caa yiathpiny m5 g6r kvv b1yr]th kivv ant5busd5n5 rvy rivm, c`xn5 ms waa kv m5 l1t kv theemn5 ms.

sourceString: There is no test to establish immunity to the virus.
targetString: Thivlv theem m5 caa yiathpiny m5 l`t bu]m pu11ny k` b1yr]th.

sourceString: Many governments around the world have advised their citizens not to travel unnecessarily amid the pandemic.
targetString: Kuumv n5 t5 xuan w55mu]]n comkvn gaat wecd5vn kv h66 /c5 kvn dee j1l baax d``r ju1th in c5 hsw thi`x.

sourceString: Lots of airlines and package holidays are making it easy for you by waiving cancellation and change fees.
targetString: Dup ri1th nhial5 t5 xuan kvnv gu`th b``l` t5 xuan jakvjv k` thi1k kv j5 kv h66 der5 l7k5 p``k5rs kv gu`cn5 y577n5.

sourceString: Particularly avoid cruise ship travel.
targetString: Cet kv ms te p`l laath` murk`p` baax.

sourceString: Older travelers and those with underlying health conditions are most at risk and should avoid travel that puts them at risk, such as long plane flights, visits to crowded places, and especially cruises, even outside of severely affected areas.
targetString: J11l tin c5 dsx kvnv tin te kv rik pusl` pu11ny t5 k]x kv kvn dee juey kv mal k`ps k` dee kvn j1l m5 dekv jak` k``p jueykv dhil p`l, cetkv ms te j1l r511ynhial m5 b``r, gu`l gu`thn5 t5 c5 naath mat tin, am`n5 m5 cetkvms te j1l murk`p`ms, vc`x kv gu`th t5 /k1n luvx v l7x.

sourceString: In affected areas, most experts recommend a practice known as social distancing.
targetString: Gu`thn5 tin caa luvx, g77r nvy tin tekv x`cv 5 dee raan c5aax m5 csal5 “cu]x kv kam” l1t.

sourceString: This means minimising contact with others by keeping a distance of six feet or two meters from them and avoiding gathering together in groups.
targetString: Vn nvmv nyoothv n5h66 b5 raan r7m kv nvy k]kivn jak` kuiy kv cu]x v n1n kvv k11th c56kn5 d1x b1kvl kiv m5t5r5 d1x rvw t5 n1n kvkv k` b5 du]l nath kvr7 gu11th kvl kv bu]n p`l.

sourceString: Some areas permit small groups; others prohibit all group gatherings.
targetString: Th11x gu`thn5 nhsakv bu]n m5 tst; k` gu`th tin k]x p2nkv du]l bun5 kvvliw.

sourceString: Measures you are encouraged to take include working from home whenever possible, avoiding crowds and avoiding leaving your home unless absolutely necessary.
targetString: Tin nhsakv 5 dee raan kv l1t v h66 der5 l`t c5ex m5 luotvrs, p`l gu`thn5 t5 c5 naath mat th5n am`n5 p`l b`ny` ci2xdu piny baax v thivl m5 g77rv.

sourceString: If you must go out, try to stay at least 2 meters (6 feet) away from other people.
targetString: M5 der5 dhil kac raar, h]nv 5 b5 cu]x kvv m5t5r5 2 ( k11th c56kn5 6) v n1n kv naath.

sourceString: In many places these measures are required.
targetString: Gu`th5 t5 xuan g6r kvjv der5 kvn titi l1t.

sourceString: Follow hygiene practices like for flu prevention.
targetString: Guur5 l`t yup` cet kv g1x p5luuk`.

sourceString: Frequently wash your hands with soap and warm water, and then dry your hands on a clean towel.
targetString: Lapn5 tetku malv lak5 kv thaabuuny kvnv p5 t5 l2th-l22th, k` b5 tetku k7t kvv b55y puc` m5 gsaa.

sourceString: As coronaviruses are enveloped viruses, washing your hands with soap kills the virus by disrupting the mostly fat-based viral envelope.
targetString: Kc h66 ksrsna b1r]th v b1yr]th m5 te kvv inbvl6p, la l1kdu kv tetku kv thaabuny b1yr]th v n`k kv d`kdv kvv inbvl6p b1yr]th` min tee thisl.

sourceString: Effective hand washing requires rubbing your hands for at least 20 seconds.
targetString: L1k tetn5 kv gu11thdv g77rv jv 5 b5 tetku coth kvv thvksn5 t5 20 v we nhiam.

sourceString: Drying your washed hands physically removes some germs from your skin (so don't skip that step, and don't share towels).
targetString: K6t tetn5ku t5 c5 lak woocv th11x dvvn5 ju1thn5 k` gu]pdu (kv ku5c vms /cuu k1th vms b`l /cuu b5`yn5 puc` nyuak).

sourceString: If soap and water are not available, then use a >60% alcohol-based hand sanitizer.
targetString: M5 thivlv thaabuuny kvnv p5w, k`n5 yuup tetn5 alk]]l` m5 tee >60%.

sourceString: Alcohol is a quick germ-killer, but it's not quite instant, so this still requires the same 20 seconds of rubbing your hands together, making sure that every single scrap of skin gets wet, and then you have to wait about another minute, for the alcohol to completely dry.
targetString: Alk]]l laa n`kv dvy ju1thn5 kv p0th, duxdv h66 /cii vyut, kv ku5c vms xotv g77rvjv 5 b5 raan tetkv coth kvvl kvv thvksn5 t5 20 tin wen, k` b5 jv dhil x`th vgsaa vn h66 gu`thdiaal k` gu]pdu c5kv lu`ny, k` b5 lvn5 l5`p kvv minit kvl d]d5vn kv k66t alk]]l` kvvliw.

sourceString: Avoid touching your eyes, nose and mouth with your hands.
targetString: P`l gueer5 waxdu, wumdu am`n5 thokdu kv tetku.

sourceString: Most people touch their faces every few minutes, all day long.
targetString: R5w nvvn5 t5 xuan la kvn nhiam divn v gueer kv ksr minitn5 t5 tst n5 vn t`mv kv c`x kvvliw.

sourceString: Try to do this less, and try to wash your hands before touching your face.
targetString: H]nv 5 b5 nvmv l1t v kuiy k` h]nv 5 b5 tetku lak v /ken5 nhiamdu n5 gu22r.

sourceString: Also, try to avoid touching surfaces you don't have to touch in the first place, at least with your bare hands.
targetString: V nysk, h]nv 5 b5 gueer5 gu`thn5 t5 /c5 de gu22r p`l n5 tuk`dv kv tetku baax.

sourceString: Cough and sneeze into your elbow or a tissue, and then immediately throw away the tissue and wash your hands.
targetString: K5l5 kiv thiamn5 v we k` c5`lu kiv wargak, k` b55 wargak vms y1k kv p0th k` b5 tetku lak.

sourceString: Don't stand or sit near people who might be sick.
targetString: /Cu cux kiv nyur gu11th m5 th5eek kv ram dee tekv juey.

sourceString: Stay at least one meter – and ideally two meters (six feet) – away.
targetString: cuxn5 kvv m5t5r kvl v we nhiam – kv gu`cdv min thu]k m5t5r5 rvw (k11th c56kn5 d1x b1kvl) – v n1n.

sourceString: As a quick way to eyeball this distance, imagine that you and the other person both reached your hands towards each other.
targetString: Cet kv du]]p in p0th n5 jvn in d2nv cu]x gu11th v b``r vmv, cetn5 f66 jin yvn naath k]kivn /cia rs cop kv tetn5kun.

sourceString: Could you touch the other person's hand without taking a step towards that person?
targetString: Jin der5 ram in d]x cop v /ken5 k1th kuany m5 t5c5 rs ram vms kv jv?

sourceString: If the answer is yes, then you're too close.
targetString: M5 w55 jv loc 5 f]n, v jvn f66 gul yvn thi22k n5 wen.

sourceString: Clean objects and surfaces that a lot of people touch, such as doorknobs, phones, and television remotes with regular household cleaner.
targetString: Coth w1th kuakn5 tin ca gu22r v naath tin k]x n5n wen, cet kv leep baap, talvpoon, kvn tueeny telvb5cin kv l11k in la lak kv tiec.

sourceString: Disinfect the surfaces with a suitable disinfectant, such as diluted household bleach.
targetString: Coth luex w1thn5 kuakn5 kv n``k luex min gsaa, cet kv b5l5c mi ca moc p5w.

sourceString: Stay home when you are sick, and avoid contact with other people until your symptoms are gone.
targetString: Nyur5 ciex m5 c5 jv nvn thi1k rivk kv j5, k` /cu thieek kv naath tin k]x am`n5 m5 cv jssc vn f66 c5 nyuuthn5ku jivvn.

sourceString: Do not share personal items that come into contact with saliva, such as toothbrushes, eating utensils, drinks, water bottles, and towels.
targetString: /Cu kuak tin c5 ruvy kv gueer nyuak kv naath, cet kv tuuth lvc, k6rv mieth, kubay m1th, w5lvn5 p55n5 kv tawvl.

sourceString: The practice of serving yourself from a common plate with your own chopsticks, common in China, should be avoided.
targetString: Ciaax k` f66 b5 raan rs ji6m ku`n k` th1n in nyuakv kv tux cet kv min la tussk k` j5 China ba dhil p`l.

sourceString: Greet people without touching them.
targetString: Ner naath kv malv v /c5 kv gueer.

sourceString: Avoid hugs, kisses, handshakes, fist bumps, and any other contact.
targetString: P`l bu]m nath, ci`m, malv kv tet, ni2t yivtn5 kiv du]]p gueer` d]divn.

sourceString: If it's impossible to avoid contact, then wash your hands both before and after.
targetString: M5 /cv rslot vn f66 der5 jek kv naath p`l, lak tetku kv nhiam kvn ksr jek`du kv naath.

sourceString: It won't protect you from the coronavirus, but it will partially protect you from the flu, which remains a greater risk than COVID-19 in many areas.
targetString: /cv j5 b5 gax p1ny kv ksrsnabayr`th, duxdv f66 derv j5 gax v m``th kv piluu in xot v la r4ivk in d55t n5 jvn k` COVID-19 gu1thn5 t5 xuan.

sourceString: This also saves you from unnecessary worry if you get the flu and think it might be the coronavirus.
targetString: Jvn b` gaxv j5 kv divvr in dee tussk bax m5 c5 piluu j5 k`p k` der5 jv guic 5 d]x v ksrsnabayr`th.

sourceString: If you are elderly or otherwise in a high-risk group and can be vaccinated for pneumonia, get that vaccination.
targetString: M5 v j5n ram c5 run kv xuan kiv t55 kvvl kv bu]n m5 in cuc v d]x der5 wal g1x ju1th pneumonia k1n, g7r kv kvn wal t]t].

sourceString: It won't protect you from viral pneumonia from COVID-19, but some COVID-19 patients have died of bacterial pneumonia that attacked their weakened lungs, so a pneumonia vaccination could save your life.
targetString: /Cv j5 b5 gax p1ny kv pneumonia kiv kv COVID-19, duxdv f66 th11x nath tin cv moc COVID-19 c5 kv l5w kv bakt5ria pneumonia in la ban pu]thkivn tin cv d`k, kv f66 ns k`n wal pneumonia derv t2kdi gax.

sourceString: Wearing masks is recommended for those who are suspected of carrying of disease and those who are in close contact with those infected.
targetString: Kuex kuum` ca lar vn f66 gsaayv kv naath tin ca diw 5 cv moc juey kvn naath tin c5 thi22k kv naath tin cv moc luex ju1th vmv.

sourceString: For those who are asymptomatic, the WHO does not recommend masks, though some national governments do.
targetString: Kv ku5c nath tin /c5 nyuuthn5 titi jsc k` kv, /ken WHO jv lar 5 b5 kvn kuum nhiam kuex, c`x min laar th11x kuumvn5 w55n5 jv.

sourceString: Wearing a mask of some kind is required in some countries and cities in an effort to reduce community transmission.
targetString: Kuex kuum` nhiam kv th11xdv g77rv jv k` th11x w55n5 kvn r0k kv f66 ba d6p ju1th kv naath xok v kuiy.

sourceString: There are worldwide shortages of surgical masks.
targetString: Kvn kuumn5 ret` dak kvn vl]x b` w55 mu]]n.

sourceString: If you do wear a mask, make sure to use it correctly.
targetString: M5 kuex5 kuum nhiam, x`thv c5 jv kuex kv gu11thdv.

sourceString: The mask should cover your nose and mouth and fit without gaps.
targetString: Vn kuum nhiam bv wumdu dhil kum kvn thokdu k` /cv b5 te kv gu11th m5 f66x.

sourceString: Wash your hands before putting on the mask and avoid touching the mask while wearing it.
targetString: Lak tetku v xot /ken5 kuum nhiam n5 kuex k` gax f66 b5 kuum gu22r min kuex5 jv.

sourceString: If you do touch it, wash your hands immediately afterwards.
targetString: M5 c5 jv gu22r, lak tetku kv p0th kv ksr thuk` l`th`dv.

sourceString: When the mask becomes damp, discard and replace it.
targetString: M5 c5 kuumdu f]c, wocv k` gvrv kv kuum d]divn.

sourceString: Remove it from the back, throw it away, and then wash your hands.
targetString: K`pv jsk vm5, y1k n5 jv k` lak tetku.

sourceString: Remember that masks are not a substitute for good hygiene: continue to wash your hands frequently.
targetString: Tit f66 kuumn5 /c5 kv nyin g2r` civvx` pusl` pu11ny: lap tetku v lak5 ciax.

sourceString: Don't stock up on masks if you don't need them.
targetString: /Cu rs jut kv kuumn5 b` m5 /c5 kv g7r.

sourceString: Mask shortages mean that healthcare workers are having trouble getting a hold of masks, which puts everyone at risk.
targetString: Dak kuumn5 lotv n5 f66 kvn l11t muktp` pusl` pu11ny te kv kv rivk kv jekdivn b`, m6 nyooth f66 naath v rvi rik`.

sourceString: That includes N95 respirators, which are not recommended for the general public – these are specialist equipment which must be fitted to be optimally effective.
targetString: Kvn am`n5 dux yieek` N95, tin /k1n lar 5 d22 kuex v naath diaal – kvn titi kv kuak l11tn5 tin la kuex kvn kv v gsaa kv ciaax l1tdivn.

sourceString: Leave them for healthcare workers.
targetString: P1lv kv l11t pusl` pu11ny.

sourceString: Avoid crowded areas, especially enclosed areas without much air circulation, such as conferences, performances, shopping malls, public transportation, and religious services.
targetString: P`l we gu1thn5 tin c5 thi11x kv naath, v civk cet kv gu1th tin g1k v thil jism m5 com m5 j`l, cet kv gu1th du]]l5, tiec k7k`, thurbil wec kvvliw kvn civx pal5.

sourceString: Events which involve a large scale gathering of people, from religious pilgrimages to music concerts, are being canceled worldwide, in an effort to contain the spread of the virus.
targetString: X11r5 tin we naath t5 xuan th5n, v tookv k` nyin pal` kuthn5 v we k` x11r5 tuaar5, ba kvn diaal xok w55 mu]]n kvvliw, kv f]n k` f66 ba thi`y ju1th bayr`th rvi fsaa t]w.

sourceString: Tourist attractions, businesses, and transportation may be closed, especially in affected countries.
targetString: Gu1th tin riaw-riaaw tin n77x gu``l, g`pvn5, kvn ri1th j1l ba kvn diaal dhil g1k rvi w55n5 tin cv cuit kv juey.

sourceString: Some canceled events, especially performances, sporting events, and classes, are being moved online, which means you can experience them without traveling.
targetString: Th11x x11r5 tin ca k1p cu]x cet kv tuaar5, x11r5 yithpustn5, kv k5l0thn5, ba kvn diaal snlaany, m5 lotn5 f66 b5 kv jek v thil k1th m5 kuany5.

sourceString: At petrol/gas stations, use gloves or wipe down the handle with a disinfectant wipe if you can.
targetString: Rvi gu1th petvrsli66m/gu11th j`th`, kuexn5 curapn5ku kiv coth k``pdv kv wal n1k luex` m5 t22 th5n.

sourceString: After filling up, clean your hands with hand sanitizer.
targetString: Ks ksr pi`kdu, coth tetku kv w`l n1k luex`.

sourceString: The U.S. and Canadian governments recommend avoiding travel by cruise ship.
targetString: Kuumv U.S. kvn Kvnvda ca jv lar v j1l kv baabuur5 p1l kv.

sourceString: Infections spread easily on board, and medical care is limited.
targetString: Luex la reepv rs kv p0th min te naath riv ri11y, k` thilv du2lwal m5 com rvidv.

sourceString: Amid a cruise ship outbreak, quarantines and docking are challenging partly due to the large number of people aboard.
targetString: Ms c5 luex tussks rvi ri11y, nyuur ran gu11thdv k`rsa kvn we baabuur gu11th yien` la bvc kv kv f66 xuan naath rvidv.

sourceString: Even cruise ships without confirmed cases have been denied permission to dock due to virus fears, and in the high-profile case of the Diamond Princess in Japan, hundreds of people were infected on the ship.
targetString: Am`n5 kvn baabuur5 tin thil ran ca jek cv moc juey rvydivn ca th11xkivn pen yi2n kv dual bayr`th`, k` kv d5t k`p` ju1th kv naath cet kv dux Diamond Princess k` Japan, cuv naath t5 kur dsp rvi baabuur`.

sourceString: If you believe you may be infected, call a hospital or local emergency medical services instead of going in person to avoid infecting others.
targetString: M5 x``th5 jv 5 d]x cv j5 k`p kv luex, csl j5 du22lwal kiv naath tin l`t kv ku5c rik` m5 rup-rup v /c5 ms a f66 b5 we k` rad]divn kv ku5c g1xdu kv f66 b5 naath k]kivn dsp.

sourceString: Mention your symptoms and travel history.
targetString: Lat nyuuthn5 tin jek5 kvn gu11th in c5 we j1l th5n.

sourceString: Wear a medical mask and follow the instructions of authorities and doctors.
targetString: Kuexn5 kuum nhiam k` guur5 tin ba lar v k5m kv jkuumv.

sourceString: See also: Flight and health
targetString: Gu5cn5 b` k`: Ri1th kvn ciaax pusl` pu11ny.

sourceString: On a plane, follow the same hygiene practices as anywhere else: wash hands frequently, or use alcohol-based hand sanitizer if it's not convenient to leave your seat, and avoid touching your face.
targetString: Rvi ri11y guur5 civx pusl` pu11ny cet min la l`t5 gu1thn5 tin k]x: lap tetku a lak5 kv gu11th, kiv coth kv kv alksl kvn than5taydhvr m5m /cv rs lot vn f66 b5 rs jivvc w55 ksaamdu, k` /cu nhiamdu thiap.

sourceString: Researchers have found that passengers in window seats have less risk of contact with sick people.
targetString: C5 g66r x`` jv jek vn f66 j11l tin nyur w55 ksamn5 tin thieek kv wernyin5 kuiy rivkdivn kv f66 b5 kv rs gu22r kv j5 ju11thn5.

sourceString: Try to book a window seat, and avoid moving around the cabin during the flight.
targetString: F]n f66 b5 mvkn5 ksm in thieek kv wernyin k` p`l j1l in we gu11th coown5 min t5 rvi ri11y.

sourceString: After washing your hands and before sitting down, use disinfectant wipes to wipe down the area around your seat.
targetString: Kv ksr l1kdu kv tetku kvn min c5 nyuur, coth tetku kv w`l n1k luex` k` du`cn5 jv gu11th nyuur`du.

sourceString: Wipe hard surfaces, and if your seat is leather you can wipe that too.
targetString: Coth w`th xsaakn5 tin bu]m-bu]]m, k` ksmdu v ksm gup` cothv b`.

sourceString: Don't wipe a cloth seat, as the moisture can make transmission easier.
targetString: /cu ksm biet coth kv f66 f]cdv la d6p ju1th v jak` thi1k.

sourceString: When using disinfectant wipes, follow the instructions on the packaging.
targetString: Kv gu11th in l`th5 w`l n1k luex kv jv, guur5 tin ca lar kv ciaax kuakn5 rvi ri11y.

sourceString: And remember, viruses enter through your mouth, nose, and eyes – wiping down the area doesn't hurt, but it's not a substitute for proper hygiene.
targetString: K` tit f66 bayr`th la w22 kv thok ran, kv wum, kvn wal – cu]thdu kv gu11thdu thilv rivk m5 n77xv duxdv f66 /c5 g2r kv pusl` pu11ny.

sourceString: Wash your hands and avoid touching your face.
targetString: Lak tetku k` /cu nhiamdu lvn gu22r.

sourceString: And use a tissue to touch the touch screen or other controls.
targetString: Moc rs kv b5y kiv pec b5 yithk5r5n coth kv jv kiv g``x d]divn.

sourceString: When using the lavatory, use paper towels to turn off the faucet and open the door, then throw them away.
targetString: M5 w55 dueel coown5, lvp bap kv wargak k` ritv k` b5 kv yusr gu11th in la y1k kv kv th5n.

sourceString: Airlines in affected areas are taking steps to reduce transmission and keep passengers safe.
targetString: Mukt`pn5 ri1thn5 gu1thn5 tin cv naath d`k th5n kv juey k`n kvn c11p tin d22 xok d6p ju1th kvn ciaax mal` j11l5.

sourceString: For instance, these may include cleaning facilities more frequently, allowing flight attendants to wear masks, and serving prepackaged instead of freshly heated meals.
targetString: C``t, kvn mat kvn nyin yiec` rvc kv gu1th t5 xuan k` jak kvn naath tin guur j1l ri11y k` f66 ba kuumn5 kuex, th6p kv kuan t5 ca g`k n5 wen v /c5 ms kuan t5n pay thsl rvi ri11y.

sourceString: If a group of passengers is connecting from an area with a severe outbreak, the flight attendants may be able to seat them away from the rest of the passengers (and if you were recently in a high-risk area, consider telling the flight attendants for this reason).
targetString: M5 t22 kv bu]n kvl m5 be wec m5 cv naath d`k th5n vl]x kv juey, d]x dee ran in guur j1l ri11y kv jak` nyur gu11thdivn k`r] v ns1n kv naath tin k]x, (k` m5 pay5 jivvn gu11th m5 c5 rivkdv d5t, tit f66 b5 jv l1r ram in guur j1l ri11y vn nsms).

sourceString: You may be prohibited from changing seats on the flight.
targetString: D]x derv tussk 5 d22 j5 p2n f66 gvvr5 ksm b` rvi ri11y.

sourceString: This is so that, if someone on the flight turns out to be infected, the authorities can track down the people who were sitting near them for testing or quarantine.
targetString: Vns l1t jv kv f66 m5 cv te kv ram ca ben jek cv moc juey rvi ri11y b5 kuumv naath tin thieekv jv ben g7r k` bv kv jak` nyur gu11th kvl kvn f66 ba kv thvm.

sourceString: COVID-19 is treated by relieving symptoms and preventing complications.
targetString: COVID-19 tu]mdv v f66 ba nyuuthn5 kv jak` jivn kvn f66 ba rep ji``k`dv kv rs gax.

sourceString: There is no vaccine or specific treatment for the novel coronavirus.
targetString: Thilv wal t5 gax jv kiv du]]p kvl m5 tusm kv jv ksrsnabayr`th in rvl rs.

sourceString: Research into a vaccine or specific antiviral drug is underway.
targetString: G6r w1l m5 d22 gax jv kiv w`l kvl m5 d22 ku tom jv ku naath lvn te l`tdv.

sourceString: There are a variety of trials using HIV medications and other novel antiviral medications for treatment of COVID-19.
targetString: T22 kv dup t5 g66l t5 kua f]n kv wal HIV kvn wal bayrsl5 k]kivn kv tu]m COVID-19.

sourceString: Mild symptoms may be relieved by taking paracetamol (acetaminophen).
targetString: Nyuuthn5 tin tsatn5 la wusc kv kv kv th7p paracetamol (acetaminophen).

sourceString: If you are infected with COVID-19, countries will isolate you until several consecutive tests for COVID-19 are negative.
targetString: M5 cv j5 moc kv COVID-19 dee w55 j5 jak` nyur gu11thdu k`rsa am`n5 m5 c5 them t5 xuan jv nyoth 5 thilv jv.

sourceString: If you have been in close contact with someone infected with COVID-19, many countries will quarantine you for 14 days since the last exposure and monitor you for signs and symptoms.
targetString: M5 c5 thi22k kv ram cvk`p kv COVID-19 dee w55 t5 xuan j5 jak` nyur gu11th kvl kv n5n 14 v tookv k` c`x in jsak 2 r7m kv yv k` d22 nyuuthn5 tin tussk `k j5 guic.

sourceString: Some countries will also test you even if you don't have symptoms.
targetString: Th11x w55n5 b` d22 j5 th22m v c`x thilv j5 nyuuthn5 t5 tussk.

sourceString: In many countries, the healthcare system has been stretched to the point of not being able to handle the sheer number of patients, and there is a chance you may be refused treatment due to the lack of available medical staff, supplies or equipment.
targetString: Rvi w55n5 t5 xuan, c1p gu1th pusl` pu1ny ca jv tiecn5 k` f66 /cv jv dee f]n vn f66 bv th11x j5 ju1th lu`k, k` derv tussk vn f66 ba j5 p2n tu]m kv thil k5mn5 wal, nyin tum` kvn kuak g1x nath kv r].

sourceString: Many countries have shut down or severely limited flights, ships, and border crossings, especially to and from affected areas.
targetString: W55 t5 xuan ca ri1thkivn g1k kiv ca j1l nath jak` kuiy kv ri1th, baabuur5 kvn b1l k2thn5, v civk tin we kiv b` gu1thn5 tin cv naath t]x th5n kv juey.

sourceString: Even more countries have imposed restrictions on arriving travelers, either barring entry (maybe with an exception for local citizens and permanent residents) or requiring you to be quarantined, typically for 14 days.
targetString: T22 kv th11x w55n5 b` t5 ca cak l7k n5 cunh rvc nath tin b` r6l5 k]kivn, kv l7k ben`divn rvc, (kiv d]x dee kvn p`l n5 naath tin la nnvkivn kvn tin ciex w55n5kivn) kiv d22 jv g7r 5 b5 nyuur gu11th kvl kv n5n 14.

sourceString: Even if a mandatory quarantine is not imposed, you may be asked to "self-quarantine" by staying at home and not interacting with other people.
targetString: M5 c`x /k1n jv lar 5 b5 naath dhil nyuur gu11th kvl kv bu]m, d22 j5 ji6k 5 b5 nyuur gu11th kvl kv t11du ciex kiv c5 b5 thi22k kv naath tin k]x.

sourceString: The most severe restrictions are on travellers who have recently been to affected areas, but increasingly many countries are applying them to incoming travellers overall.
targetString: Ji``kdv min d55t la t22 k` naath tin pay ben j`l5 w55n5 tin cv naath d`k th5n kv juey vl]x, duxdv f66 w22 kv m5 reepv rs vn f66 w55 t5 xuan baap kvn5 j11l diaal tin be rvi w55nkivn.

sourceString: Some countries have even prohibited all or almost all foreigners from entry or limited the ability of local citizens and residents to leave.
targetString: Th11x w55n5 ca cak l7k n5 jv vn f66 b5 naatn t5 be r6l5 k]kivn cop wecdivn kiv th11x nath tin be r6l5 k]kivn c5 kv cup w5c, k` ca jv l7k vn f66 b5 gaat wecdivn lvn we r6l5 k]kivn.

sourceString: What are the affected areas?
targetString: Gu1th tin cv d`k kv gu1th tinkivn?

sourceString: Well, this is a fast-changing situation, and each country/region/organization has its own list of what areas are subject to restrictions.
targetString: Gsayv, jvn nvmv v kvl m5 reep rs kv p0th, k` weckvl/r5jin/srganayth22ci kvl t22 kv ku00n kv tin cv gs1r piny kv gu1th tin guicv 5 cv d`k tin /cv lvn g7r.

sourceString: The city of Wuhan is on every list and the rest of mainland China is on most.
targetString: Rvk Wuhan in d55t, jaa th5n k` ku00n diaal kvn d`r wec China vn la min nhiam.

sourceString: Other areas that are often included: France, Germany, Hong Kong, Iran, Italy, Japan, Macau, Singapore, South Korea, Spain, Taiwan, the United Kingdom, the United States, the Schengen Area as a whole, and sometimes various others.
targetString: Gu1th k]kivn5 tin la malv mat kv th5n: France, Germany, Hong Kong, Iran, Italy, Japan, Macau, Singapore, South Korea, Spain, Taiwan, the United Kingdom, the United States, vn daay Schengen Area kvvliw kv th11xkivn t5 xuan.

sourceString: Some countries have imposed restrictions based on citizenship or residency from severely affected areas.
targetString: Th11x w55n5 ca jv l7k 5 b5 naath k]kivn thiec kv f66 b5 kv la nvvkivn kvn f66 dee kv ben ciex w55n5kivn t5 be gu1thn5 tin cv d`k kv juey.

sourceString: A detailed list of entry restrictions is maintained by the IATA.
targetString: Min thu]k kv ciaax in ca l7k ca jv gs1r piny kvvliw v IATA.

sourceString: It doesn't cover all the restrictions, but it's still useful.
targetString: Jvn /cv ruac kv ku5c k` tin ca l7k kvn diaal, duxdv f66 xotv gsaayv.

sourceString: Keep up to date—the outbreak and the travel restrictions are changing rapidly.
targetString: G7r min l``t rs – vn thi`y ju1th rvi fsaa kvn l7k j`l5 gvvr kvn rs ciax.

sourceString: For travel in the near future, consider making refundable reservations in case the changing situation forces you to change your plans.
targetString: Kv ku5c j`l5 kv gu11th in b5 ben, tit f66 d22 j5 lu]c yi77ku m5 cv tussk vn f66 c5 g2r civvx` kv rs j5 jak` gvvr5 c1ru kv ciaax j1l.

sourceString: Avoid buying tickets with a connection in an affected area – even changing planes can make you subject to restrictions.
targetString: P`l f66 b5 tikvt ksk m5 we wec m5 cv d`k kv juey vmv – kv f66 n5 vn g2r civvx` kv min tussk derv j5 jak` /c5 cup gu11th in g77r5.

sourceString: Flights may get canceled with little notice, either due to the disease's spread and ever-changing entry restrictions, or simply because fewer people are flying and airlines are having trouble filling seats.
targetString: D22 jivvn ri1thn5 gvr kv th7p l``r` m5 tst, d]x kv ku5c thi`x` ju1th kv fsw kiv kv g2r civvx` kv f66 thil naath t5 lvn nh6k cu]p wec d]divn, kiv f66 dak naath tin dee jivvn kv jvn ri`y vms k` thilv mukt`p ri1thn5 gu11th d22 naath jek th5n t5 thi``x ksamn5.

sourceString: You might also be delayed for hours upon arrival waiting for temperature checks and related procedures and paperwork, or even get quarantined for two weeks.
targetString: Derv tussk b` 5 d22 j5 jak` j`ny kv k`nydu raar kv cu]pdu kv f66 liip5 f66 ba l2th pu11nydu ksx thvm kvn guec wargakn5 tin j`l kv j5, kiv derv tussk 5 ba j5 jak` nyur gu11th kvl kv juskn5 rvw.

sourceString: Be prepared for the possibility of disruption to your travel plans, especially if traveling internationally.
targetString: Rial5rs5k` kv kv f66 d22 j`l5 pen vn kams, cet kv f66 m5 v j1l m5 we r77l d]divn.

sourceString: Even if you're nowhere near affected areas there's a risk that you'll have to stay at the destination longer than planned if you've shared a building or vessel with an infected person.
targetString: M5 c`x thilv gu11th m5 cv naath d`k th5n kv juey m5 c5 ksx we th5n, derv tussk 5 der5 we j``ny gu11th in c5 we th5n kv pek m5 b``l gu11th caar5 m5 cv we jssc 55 c5 duel nyuak kvvl kv ram cvmoc juey.

sourceString: For example, in late February an Italian doctor on vacation in Costa Adeje (Canary Islands) was diagnosed with COVID-19, and as a result all the guests in the hotel he stayed at were quarantined.
targetString: C``t, kv guut paay rvw cuv te kv k5m Tiliaan m5 c5 we l]]x k` Costa Adeje (Canary Icland) cua jv jek cv jv moc COVID-19, kv ku5c vms cua naath diaal t22 c5 t]]c k` hotel in t22 th5n jak` nyur gu11th kvl.

sourceString: Lockdowns and other internal restrictions
targetString: G1k weckvn l7k k` tin k]kivn rvi wec.

sourceString: Some countries and regions, especially severely affected ones, are implementing emergency lockdowns and restrictions on people's movements and activities, even for those who haven't recently been abroad.
targetString: Th11x w55n5 kvn r5jin5, v civk w55 tin cv d`k kv juey kvn lar kv jv 5 ba wec g1k kv p0th kvn l7k k` tin k]x k` j1l naath kvn l`t, am`n5 naath t5 thil gu11th d]divn m5 c5 raan we j1l th5n.

sourceString: These include the temporary reintroduction of some border controls, restrictions on travel within the country, closing or limiting service at restaurants and other establishments, banning large public events, and in the most severe cases prohibiting people from leaving the house except for essential reasons.
targetString: Kvn titi te rvidivn kv f66 ba k2thn5 wec g1k kv gu11th m5 tst, l7k k` f66 b5 naath j1l rvi wec, l7k kvn g1k du2l kuan kvn gu1th tin k]x, p`l x11r5 tin la mat naath t5 xuan, kvn f66 b` d22 naath pen f66 dee raan kac raar dueel vn5 m5 w22 kv ku5c k` m5 bum-bum.

sourceString: Beyond government restrictions, individual establishments are shutting their doors and cancelling events to try to reduce the spread of the virus.
targetString: V /c5 ms a min l7k kuumv jv k`rsa, pu1ny nath ca bapn5kivn g1k b` kv f66 k` ca x115 t5 d5t k`p cu]x kv f66 f]n kvn f66 ba thi`y bayr`th` rvi nath xok.

sourceString: In China, there are extensive restrictions on transportation and activity, which vary widely by province, city, and even by district or village.
targetString: K` China, t22 kv t5 xuan t5 ca l7k kv j1l nath kvn l`t, t5 g66l k` w55, r0k tin d5t am`n5 w55 tin tsatn5 kiv pek.

sourceString: Many governments recommend against traveling to China at this time.
targetString: Kuumvnt5 t5 xuan laar kvn f66 ji`k j1l m5 we k` China kv jvn gu11th vm.

sourceString: If you have no choice, do your research and get up-to-date information about the local situation wherever you are going.
targetString: M5 thilv m5 der5 lu`x, g7r x`c k` jek min tussk ciax k` l``r5 rvi gu1th in g77r5 we th5n.

sourceString: People who have traveled to Hubei face particularly severe restrictions.
targetString: Naath tin raan we j1l k` Hubei kvn la jek kvn b0cdv vl]x.

sourceString: Examples of restrictions that you may encounter in some parts of China (this is not an exhaustive list):
targetString: C``tn5 k` tin l6k kv tin d]x dee we tussk k` j5 rvi w55n5 China th11xkivn (/c5 kv kvn diaal kvn titi):

sourceString: 14-day quarantine, self-quarantine, or COVID-19 test upon arrival from other parts of China or from other countries, at your expense
targetString: Nyuur gu11th kvl kv n5n 14, nyuuru gu11thdu k`rsa, kiv th2m kv COVID-19 kv cu]pdu wec d]divn k` China kiv wec d]divn kv yi7u t5 yor j5n piny

sourceString: questions about your travel and medical history (lying can get you years in prison)
targetString: Thiecn5 kv gu11th in b55 th5n kvn ciaax pusl` pu11nydu (cak-cak der5 nax run rvi thijivvn)

sourceString: mandatory registration using an online or paper form
targetString: G]ru piny kv bu]m snlaay kiv kv pussm m5 ca l1t kv wargak

sourceString: requirement to wear a face mask in public
targetString: G6r k` f66 b5 kuum nhiam dhil kuex min t55 rvi nath

sourceString: people who have been outside of China within 14 days not allowed into public places like malls
targetString: Naath tin c5 raan jivvn rvi China kv n5n 14 /ca raan nh7k we gu11th in xuan naath th5n cet kv gu11th k7k`

sourceString: shops only accept mobile payments, not cash
targetString: Thukn5 nhsk kvn5 yor yi77n5 piny kv palvpoon, thil m5 k1p kv tet` ran

sourceString: restaurants, transportation and other establishments refusing service to non-Chinese citizens
targetString: Du2l kuan, thurbivvl5 kvn gu1th tin k]x /c5 kv ruac kv naath t5 be r6l5 k]kivn

sourceString: many forms of transportation reduced or shut down
targetString: Ri1th k6t t5 xuan ca r5wdivn g1k

sourceString: mandatory real-name registration for public transit cards
targetString: Th7pdu kv ci6tdu min thu]k kv g]r piny kat` min rvtv nhiam

sourceString: access in and out of a town, village, or city completely blocked
targetString: Thilv we rvi r00k kiv ben raar rvi r00k ca kvn diaal g1k

sourceString: non-resident visitors prohibited from entering apartment complexes
targetString: Gu``l tin /c5 civx n5 jvn gu11th vms /ca kv nh7k we rvy tiecn5 tin civc kv

sourceString: only allowed to go outside once every two days to get supplies

sourceString: businesses, activities, and attractions closed
targetString: G`pv, l`t kvn gsy wec tin bvvr naath ca kvn diaal g1k

sourceString: businesses need local government permission to re-open
targetString: G`pv g77r la``r kv kuumv kv ff6 ba kulv nysk kv l2p

sourceString: restaurants (if they are even open) require a minimum distance between customers
targetString: Du2l kuan, (m5 c`x ca kv ku lvp), g77r kvn cu]x kiv nyuur kv kam k` naath tin be rvc

sourceString: selling substandard face masks has a maximum sentence of life imprisonment
targetString: Ksk kuum` min kuiy gssydv nax raan k` thijin k` pek teek`dv

sourceString: As of mid-March 2020, Europe is the epicenter of the epidemic, and many European countries have closed their borders to international travel - only border commuters and freight are allowed to cross.
targetString: Kv gu11th m5 cet kv d`r paay di]k 2020, Yursp cua jvn la gu11th in nhiams kv min c5 juey v thi`x, k` cu w55 Yursp t5 xuan k2thn5kivn g1k kv ku5 j`l5 wec mu]]n –cu dusthn5 ri1th tin la j`l ciax kvn tin nax kuak k`r] kv j1l.

sourceString: Also businesses other than food stores and pharmacies are closed, and public transport has been reduced or stopped.
targetString: G`pvn5 b` v lvn xu``n5 gu1th t]w` kuan kvn gu1th k7k` wal cua kv g1k, k` cua thurbivvl5 tin j`l kv j5 wec xok kiv cua kv g1k.

sourceString: In the worst affected countries including Italy, Spain and France, lockdowns like in China in January, have been implemented.
targetString: Rvi w55n5 tin c5 ji``kdv d5t th5n cet kv Tiliaan, Yithpvvny kv Pvrvvny, cua kvn diaal g1k cet kv China kvl.

sourceString: As well the EU has closed its outer borders.
targetString: Cu EU k2thn5 kv diaal g1k b`.

sourceString: COVID-19 is prevalent also in North America.
targetString: COVID-19 b` jvn jaa th5n d5tv k` Nsth Amvrkvn.

sourceString: The borders between Canada, the U.S., and Mexico are closed to non-essential travel, and in many areas bans on big gatherings are in effect (this means places like restaurants are closed, and events are canceled).
targetString: K2thn5 kam` Kvnvda, kv U.S., kv Mvkth5k6 ca kv g1k kv ku5c j`l5 tin thil lust, k` ca dusl nath kv r] guathn5 t5 xuan l7k (m5 lotn5 f66 gu1th tin cet kv gu1th kuan ca kv g1k, k` ca x11r5 p`l).

sourceString: Numerous state, county, and municipal jurisdictions have issued stay-at-home orders that require all nonessential businesses to close.
targetString: Ithteetn5 t5 xuan, kssnt5n5 kvn gu1th xutn5 r0kn5 ca jv lar 5 nyur rams dueelv m5 nyooth f66 ca g`pvn5 tin nyu]n-nyu]]n diaal g1k.

sourceString: With lots of flights canceled, warnings issued, and restrictions imposed, flying in the time of coronavirus can be a challenge.
targetString: Kv ri1th t5 nyin xuan t5 ca pen j1l, ca lu2k k1m raar, k` ca t5 k]kivn l66k, j1l ran kv n5n ksrsnabayr`th ca rivk m5 d55t t`mv.

sourceString: Some routes are not possible.
targetString: Th11x dupn5 /c5 naath lvn cooth kv kv.

sourceString: Others will require more inconvenient connections than usual—multiple stops and long waits between flights.
targetString: K]kivn g77r kvn c11p t5 xuan t5 thil n5 wen, - cu]x kv gu1th t5 xuan kvn liep m5 b``r kamn5 ri1thn5.

sourceString: In some cases that means more expensive tickets.
targetString: Kv th11x gu1thn5 lotv n5 f66 b5 yi7u t5 xuaan jivvn kv t5kvt.

sourceString: On the other hand, the good news is that many flights are cheaper than usual due to decreased demand, and there's a decent chance you'll get an empty seat next to you.
targetString: Kv min d]x, l``r in gsaa v f66 ri1th t5 xuan c5 yi7ukivn ku00 k` t11 in wen kv f66 cv thil naath t5 k66t, k` derv tussk b` 5 derv te kv ksm m5 te baax gek`du.

sourceString: Build in extra time for your connections, especially if transferring from an international flight to a domestic flight and especially if your itinerary involves a country that's seriously affected.
targetString: L`tn5 thaakn5 k]kivn, m5 jivvn5 k` ri1y m5 j``l kam r6l5 ku lv we k` ri` m5 j`l rvi wec, kvn f66 m5 jivn5 wecm5 c5 k1p ju1th kv naath d5t th5n.

sourceString: Screenings, temperature checks, extra paperwork, and the associated waiting around can add minutes or hours before you're allowed to continue on your journey.
targetString: D``k nath, th2m leth` pu11ny, wargakn5 tin k]x tin lvn l1t, kvvl kv thaakn5 tin lvn liep kv naath kvn minitn5 tin l0n mat th5n minxotv /k1n j5 n5 nh6k f66 b5 r0t piny.

sourceString: You may find it harder than usual to buy a ticket to or from a destination subject to warnings and restrictions.
targetString: Der5 jv jek bumv v m``th k` min x`c5 n5 wen vn k7kdu kv t5kvt kv wedu kiv bendu gua11th in g77r5 vn f66 /cv gsaa kv luek kvn tin ca l7k.

sourceString: This is a real concern if you're trying to get out of an affected area.
targetString: Nvmv v du]]r m5 bvc m5 g77r5 f66 kac5 raar wec m5 cv d`k kv juey.

sourceString: For instance, most aggregators are not selling tickets from China to the United States (presumably to avoid falling afoul of restrictions and being on the hook for a passenger's flight out).
targetString: C``t, gu1th tg5 nyin xuan /c5 kvn t5kvt k1m ram jivn k` China 5 kuv lv we k` Yunaytet Y5tht22t (divvw` jv 5 v l7kdivn kv pvn ran k` rivk kv f66 ba we p2n nyuur kv ku5c k` tin ca l7k kvn f66 b5 ri`y we g1k nhial vn th]xs).

sourceString: To buy a ticket for an itinerary like this, you may have to contact the airline or use a lesser-known aggregator.
targetString: Kv k6k t5kvt` kv ku5c gu1th in w55 th5n cet kv vnv, b5 dhil ruac kv mukt`p ri1th nhial5 kiv b5 l`t kvvl kv gu11th m5 x1c kv.

sourceString: Another possibility is to buy two separate tickets (for instance, a ticket from China to Cambodia and a second ticket from Cambodia to the U.S.), but be careful you won't get quarantined or lose your luggage in between.
targetString: Du]]p kvl d]divn m5 dee gsaa v f66 b5 t5kvtn5 rvw t5 g66l ksk (c``t, t5kvt jivn k` China k` w22 k` Combodia kvn t5kvt in rvwdv m5 jivn k` Combodia w22 k` U.S.),duxdv f66 k`n5 tiit vn f66 m5 /ca j5 b5 we jak` nyur gu11thdu k`rsa kiv b5 kuaku bath kamn5 t].

sourceString: Connecting flights can be a problem.
targetString: Jivvn k` ri`ys v we k` ri`ys v rivk m5 /ken5 met nvn.

sourceString: The risk of getting stuck in the connection city is higher than usual right now, due to delays for screening and testing as well as extensive cancellations.
targetString: Rivk k` f66 b5 we d66t wec in der5 ri`y in d]x we k1n th5n ca rivk m5 /ken5 met nvn vn t`mv, kv ku5c gax piny` kv l2y nath kvn th2m kvvl kv f66 dee riy p1k.

sourceString: Connecting in an affected area may lead to entry restrictions later on, and if you've been in an affected area recently some countries won't even let you change planes.
targetString: Vn f66 w55 jv r0t wecm5 cv d`k kv juey derv j5 n6x f66 b5 coth k` tin ca l7k kv ksrv, k` m5 c5 ksx we wec m5 cv d`k kv juey kv gu11th in pay we, th11x w55n5 d]x d22 j5 p2n f66 b5 ri`y gvr.

sourceString: On certain itineraries there is a risk of getting quarantined somewhere along the way.

sourceString: So book a direct flight if you can, and if not, think carefully about where to connect.

sourceString: Many embassies and consulates have evacuated nonessential staff, and some have shut down operations completely.

sourceString: Emergency assistance should still be available, though it's possible you may have to contact a further-away consulate if your local one has shut down.

sourceString: If you have been stranded due to the pandemic, your nearest consulate may be able to help you find a flight home, arrange an emergency loan so you can buy a ticket, or provide an emergency passport.
targetString: M5 ca j5 we k1p cu]x kv ku5c thi`y` ju1th rvi fsaa, ksnthulvvtdu m5 thi1kv derv j5 lu`k kv du]]p in der5 jek ri`y m5 nax j5 ciex, derv j5 moc kv d2n in rup-rup k` der5 ksk kv t5kvt, kiv derv j5 moc p1thpusst v rup-rup.

sourceString: At the very least they can keep you informed about the local situation and notify you about recently introduced travel requirements and restrictions.

sourceString: Ordinary consular services such as visa and passport processing may be suspended or restricted to urgent need, depending on the location and the consulate.

sourceString: Although some people call the disease "Wuhan pneumonia" (武汉(漢)肺炎/武肺), "Wuhan disease", or "Chinese virus", the use of these terms is considered racist in China and by many people of Chinese origin.
targetString: C`x min cssl th11x nath juey vms 5 ‘pnemonia Wuhan’ (武汉(漢)肺炎/武肺), "juey Wuhan", kiv ‘bayr`th j5 China’, lat nath kv kvn ri``t titi cv jssc 5 v ny5r nath tin la j5 China.

sourceString: It is still common to refer the disease as "Wuhan pneumonia" or "Chinese virus" in places like Hong Kong and Taiwan.
targetString: Xotv csal kv jv vn juey 5 pneumonia Wuhan kiv bayr`th j5 China gu1thn5 t5 cet kv Hong Kong kvn Taiwan.

sourceString: To be safe, use location-neutral terms when referring to the disease, such as "COVID-19", "novel coronavirus", or just "the virus" or "the pandemic".
targetString: M5 g775 f66 b5 mal, cslv kv ci6t in csal kv jv v naath diaal cet kv ‘COVID-19’, ‘ksrsnabyr`th in rvl rs’ kiv ‘bayr`th’ kiv ‘jueyin c5 fsw thi`x’.

sourceString: Particularly in developing countries where law enforcement are poorly trained, enforcement of curfew, lockdown or stay-at-home orders are often brutal, often using forces not proportionate against crowds.
targetString: Rvi w55n5 tin /ken cop v gsaa cet kv Apirk` gu11th in la dak l`th xut` l`t th5n, l`th l`t jsath m5 ca lix cet kv vns, g1k wec kiv nyuur ci22xn5 la waa jv nax kv du]]p m5 ji``k, n5 ciax l1tdv kv bu]m k` naath t5 c5 dusl.

sourceString: Comply with these orders, and avoid crowds in public.
targetString: W2r kvvl kv kvn l``r5 xut` titi, k` /cu coth gu1thn5 tin xuan naath th5n.

sourceString: As a result of the coronavirus pandemic, xenophobia has risen in many countries, primarily but not exclusively targeting people perceived to be Chinese.
targetString: Kv jvn ku5c ksrsnabyr`th` mv c5 fsw thi`xv, ny5r kam` d6r5 cv d5t rvi w55n5 t5 xuan, kv tukdv v ny5r chinan5 duxdv f66 /cv lvn xot v la chinan5 k`r].

sourceString: There has been a worldwide spike in racist incidents targeting people of East Asian origin, including in major cities such as New York, London and San Francisco.
targetString: Cv te kv k11th t5xuan w55 mu]]n kvvliw kv ciaax ny5r5 kam` d6r5 m5 lot n5 j5 cu22c Acia, kvvl kv j5 r0kn5 tin d5t cet kv NewYork, London kv San Francisco.

sourceString: In Hong Kong, Sinophobia, which was already high to begin with, has intensified as a result of the pandemic, with the result that many shops and restaurants are now denying service to mainland Chinese customers and banning Mandarin speakers from their premises (with the exception of Taiwanese).
targetString: K` Hong Kong, Sinophobia m22 la wec kvl m5 c5 juey d5t th5n cv rs rep th5n kv ku5c thi`x` ju1th kv fsw, cu pvn pinydv ben a f66 cua thukn5 kvn gu1th mieth kuan pen f66 b5 kv 1t th6p k` j5 d11r wec china tin dee raan ku`n g66r k` cua naath tin ruac kv thok mandarin p2n f66 b5 kv cunh rvc (v thilv n5 j5 Taiwan k` r]).

sourceString: Levels of xenophobia have also risen in East Asia, with some restaurants and other businesses in Japan and China refusing service to foreign customers.
targetString: Pek ny5r` kam` d6r5 cuv d5t b` rvi cu22c Acia kv naath tin k]x, v cu th11x du2l5 kuan kvn g`pvn5 k` Japan kvn china naath tin r66l p2n f66 dee kv m5th.

sourceString: In China, there have been incidents of foreigners being refused rooms by hotel staff, and foreign residents, particularly black people, being kicked out of their apartments on short notice by their landlords.

sourceString: Sources for further information on the coronavirus outbreak include:

sourceString: An online map and dashboard from the John Hopkins University Center for Systems Science and Engineering with live updates

sourceString: Partial lists of entry restrictions from IATA and The New York Times

sourceString: A variety of misinformation and conspiracy theories about the virus are being promoted online and even by some government officials, so be careful which sources you check for information.
targetString: Cua th7p l``r` kv du]]p m5 ji``k kvn f66 par naath r] jak` jsc ciax snlaany kv ku5c bayr`th` tin tussk ciax k` naath am`n5 th11x l11tn5 kuumv, kv ku5c vms tit rs kv gu11th in jek5 l``r5 th5n.

sourceString: Ensure that all information and advice you receive has been backed by reputable doctors and scientists.
targetString: X`c n5 jv nv f66 l``r kvvliw kvn luek in c5 jek ca jv nysk kv l`r v k5m m5 gsaa kvn thaant5thn5.

sourceString: In a crisis, it's natural to want to keep following the latest updates, but it may be better for your mental health to moderate the amount of news that you look at, and stick to reliable news sources.

sourceString: If you normally watch the news twice per day then stick to this schedule and do something else, rather than having the 24-hour news on continuously.
targetString: M5 la gu5c5 kv laat k` rvvw kv c`x, vns ku gu]]r n5 vn du]]p vms k` l`tn5 du]]r d]divn k` f66 b5 xuskn5 rs k` guec laatn5 kv thaakn5 t5 24.

sourceString: b'Bat SARS-like coronavirus WIV1 (Bat SL-CoV-WIV1), also sometimes called SARS-like coronavirus WIV1, is a strain of Severe acute respiratory syndrome-related coronavirus (SARSr-CoV) isolated from Chinese rufous horseshoe bats (Rhinolophus sinicus).
targetString: b’Bat SARS in cet kv ksrsnabayr`th WIV1 (Bat SL-CoV-WIV1), kv th11x gu1thn5 b` csal kv jv 5 SARS m5 cet kv ksrsnabayr`th WIV1, v kaar ju1th m5 rup-rup kv ciaax ju1th l55k` min cet kv ksrsnabayr`th (SARSr-CoV) in ca lvy k` china rupoth xap war` ji66k yu]ru]k (Rhinoloputh thinikuth).

sourceString: Like all coronaviruses, virions consist of single-stranded positive-sense RNA enclosed within an envelope.
targetString: Cet kv ksrsnabayr`thn5 diaal, bayrion5 tekv kv yitht5r00n kvl m5 pusthvtib k` RNA in ca kum kv kuum.

sourceString: The discovery confirms that bats are the natural reservoir of SARS-CoV.
targetString: Nyooth min ca jekv vn f66 kvn xapn5 kv kvn gu11th in tussk SARS-CoV th5n.

sourceString: Phylogenetic analysis shows the possibility of direct transmission of SARS from bats to humans without the intermediary Chinese civets, as previously believed.
targetString: Phithiojvnvtik kv guecdv nyoothv gssydiu]]p d6p SARS xap v raan v thil china thibet kam`divn cet kv m22 ca ksx dee guic ins.

sourceString: b'COVID-19 drug development is the research process to develop a preventative vaccine or therapeutic prescription drug that would alleviate the severity of 2019-20 coronavirus disease (COVID-19).
targetString: b’COVID-19 kv t1th w1lv v g6r x`c` m5 tussk kv ku5c w1l in dee naath gax kiv w`l m5 dee naath lu`k v bv d55t ji``k` ju1th ruun` 2019-20 (COVID-19).

sourceString: The International Clinical Trials Registry Platform of the WHO recorded 536 clinical studies to develop post-infection therapies for COVID-19 infections, with numerous established antiviral compounds for treating other infections under clinical research to be repurposed.
targetString: G]r piny w1l m5 d22 f]n ciaax in d22 pil11tpussm nax kv jv k` WHO cv g7r x`c` t5 536 kv l1t k` m5 dee naath vu lu`k v xot /ken luex COVID-19 naath n5 k`p, fs11n jv kv wal antibayrsl t5 xuan t5 ca m11t tin tusm kv ju1th k]kivn t22 ca x1c n5 wal tin thieek kv jv.

sourceString: In March, the WHO initiated the "SOLIDARITY Trial" in 10 countries, enrolling thousands of people infected with COVID-19 to assess treatment effects of four existing antiviral compounds with the most promise of efficacy.
targetString: Kv pay di]k vn WHO cuv l1t k00l jak` tussk kv f]n wal rvi w55n5 10, cuv naath t5 k5thn5n cv moc luex COVID-19 tusmdivn guic kv wal d2x xuaan t5 te th5n n5 wen kv tu]m antibayrsl tin ca m11t n5 wen t5 nyooth th11xkivn jv vn f66 derv jssc vn f66 d22 naath lu`k.

sourceString: A dynamic, systematic review was established in April 2020 to track the progress of registered clinical trials for COVID-19 vaccine and therapeutic drug candidates.Vaccine and drug development is a multistep process, typically requiring more than five years to assure safety and efficacy of the new compound.
targetString: Kvl m5 xuan jidv, kv ciaax nysak guec cua jv l1t kv pay xuaan 2020 kv f66 ba pek in ca nvn rvi dueelwal kv tu]m COVID-19 kvn l1t wal t5 lu`k naath. Wal g1x kvn wal tin dee naath lu`k xuan k11th kv, kv f66 g77rv runt5 b``l dhieec kv f66 bv kulv jssc vn f66 v wal m5 gsaa kvn derv la ksmpssny m5 thil duer kv gat ran.

sourceString: Drug development is the process of bringing a new infectious disease vaccine or therapeutic drug to the market once a lead compound has been identified through the process of drug discovery.
targetString: L1t wal v du]]p m5 lot n5 f66 dee wal tin ba gax vn juey v pay tussk jek kv jv kv g`p` wec mu]]n kv ksr k` m5 ca jv jek v ksmpanvn5 tin d5t kv ciaax in la wal v t1th kv kv jv n5 wen w55 mu]]n.

sourceString: It includes laboratory research on microorganisms and animals, filing for regulatory status, such as via the FDA, for an investigational new drug to initiate clinical trials on humans, and may include the step of obtaining regulatory approval with a new drug application to market the drug.
targetString: Jvn g77r g6r x`c` min la tussk k` lab kv guec dvvn5 ju1thn5 tin /ca guic kvn ley dsaar, thi11x d5t` p22k xut` cet kv we kv FDA, kv guec wal tin pay tussk kv f]ndivn kv pu1ny nath, k` jvn g77rv k11th tin la x1th kv f66 c5 gsaa kv wal tin pay t`th t5 kvn wedivn k` g`pv kv ku5c k` f66 ba kv jek v naath diaal.

sourceString: Development of a COVID-19 vaccine or therapeutic antiviral drug begins with matching a chemical concept to the potential prophylactic mechanism of the future vaccine or antiviral activity in vivo.
targetString: L1t w`l COVID-19 kiv ciaax in d22 lu`k naath kv antibayrsl tookv rs kv liex k` min lot k0mvkslv k` prophylatik kv c1p k` min b5 tussk kv gu11th in b5 ben kiv antibayrsl kvn min l`tv rvi vivo.

sourceString: New chemical entities (NCEs, also known as new molecular entities or NMEs) are compounds that emerge from the process of drug discovery to specify a vaccine or antiviral candidate.
targetString: M11tn5 k0mvksl tin pay tussk (NCEs, tin csal kv b` 5 nyin molvkular kiv NMEs) kvn kv m11tn5 t5 tussk kv ciaax t1th wal kv f66 ba w`ls d11k kv n w`l in d]x kv antibayrsl5kivn.

sourceString: These have promising activity against a biological target related to COVID-19 disease.
targetString: Kvn titi t`mv jscv cet te kvn kv du]]r m5 coth v ji`k kv ciaax teek` min nax rs kv COVID-19.

sourceString: At the beginning of vaccine or drug development, little is known about the safety, toxicity, pharmacokinetics, and metabolism of the NCE in humans.
targetString: Kv tukdv vn t1th wal, x1c kv du]]r m5 tst kv ciaax gssy`dv, ciaax n1kdv kv naath, pharmacokineticni, kvn metabolism k` NCE rvi ran.

sourceString: It is the function and obligation of drug development to assess all of these parameters prior to human clinical trials to prove safety and efficacy.
targetString: Jvn v l1t kvn lu1k nath tin t``th wal vn f66 ba kvn diaal titi dhil guic v xot /k1n w`l in pay l1t n5 f]n kv raan kv f66 ba gssydv x1c kvn ji``kdv.

sourceString: A further major objective of drug development is to recommend the dose and schedule for the first use in a human clinical trial ("first-in-human" [FIH] or First Human Dose [FHD], previously also known as "first-in-man" [FIM]).
targetString: Kvl d]divn m5 g77r tii kv t1th wal v f66 ba pen in d2ee raanv k1n kv gu11th kvl kar kvn thaakn5 tin d22 guur f]ndv kv gu11th in nhiam k` raan (kv nhiam-k`-raan [FIH] kiv Pek in nhiam-k`-raan [FHD], m22 ca ksx csl m22dan 5 ‘kv nhiam-k`-raan [FIM]).

sourceString: In addition, drug development must establish the physicochemical properties of the NCE: its chemical makeup, stability, and solubility.
targetString: Nysk, l1t walbv dhil guic kv nyin physicochemical tin nyin NCE: tin n77x k0mvksl5, gssydivn kvn f66 kv t5 lu11ny rvi p55n5.

sourceString: Manufacturers must optimize the process they use to make the chemical so they can scale up from a medicinal chemist producing milligrams, to manufacturing on the kilogram and ton scale.
targetString: T11th wal b5 kvn dup tin nax kvn t1thdivn dhil car kv p`l piny min t``th kvm k0mvksl kv f66 b5 kvn kv moc pek k` k0mist kv t1thdivn cet kv m5l5g5r11m, kv t1th kv t11 kilog5r11m.

sourceString: They further examine the product for suitability to package as capsules, tablets, aerosol, intramuscular injectable, subcutaneous injectable, or intravenous formulations.
targetString: B5 kv we nhiam kv th2m k` f66 vn jvn derv lu11ny v bv dhi`y rvi k` mi law v xot /ken kvn kvn5 g1x k` kapthulo, tblvt, aerosol, kiv intravenouth kv t1thdv.

sourceString: Together, these processes are known in preclinical and clinical development as chemistry, manufacturing, and control (CMC).Many aspects of drug development focus on satisfying the regulatory requirements of drug licensing authorities.
targetString: Kvvl, kvn dup titi x1c kv kv kv nhiam kv ciaax wal kvn t1th wal v k0m5thvr5, t11th wal kvn g11x (CMC). Dup t5 xuan k` t1th wal la guic kvn f66 m5 ca thi`x kvn xut tin g77r f66 ba w`l cu moc kv c1tv v kuumv min gu1n lu`x`.

sourceString: These generally constitute tests designed to determine the major toxicities of a novel compound prior to first use in humans.
targetString: Kvn iti, kvvliwdivn te rvydivn kv th2m m5 nyooth civx luex` ti xuan kv ksmpssn5 tin r0l k r] kv nhiam v xot f66 ba kv kulv f]n kv raan.

sourceString: The Canadian government announced CA$275 million in funding for 96 research projects on medical countermeasures against COVID-19, including numerous vaccine candidates at Canadian universities, with plans to establish a "vaccine bank" of new vaccines for implementation if another coronavirus outbreak occurs.
targetString: Kuumv Kvnvda cv jv lar5 batgdssr5 CA$275 rvi th7p` yi7un5 kv ku5c g7r` x`c` proj0kn5 t5 95 kv ciaax th2m kv k6r COVID-19, kvvl kv wal t5 xuan t5 l1t kv k` Yunib7thvt5n5 Kvnvda, kv c11p tin ca ku2x piny k` b0xk5 wal g1x ju1th tin pay ben kv l`thdivn l`t m5 c5 ksrsnabayr`th d]divn lvn we tussk.

sourceString: Clinical trial programs involve three, multiple-year stages toward product approval, and a fourth, post-approval stage for ongoing safety monitoring of the vaccine or drug therapy:
targetString: Psrg5r11mn5 f]n wal tin pay t`th we kv kv dup di]k kv f66 ba jv kulv nvn vn f66 cv gsaa, kv xuaandivn, v xot x1th w1l kv wedv nhiam kv mal kv guec gssy` w1l m5 derv naath lu`k:

sourceString: Phase I trials, usually in healthy volunteers, determine safety and dosing.
targetString: K1th f]1 in I gu1thn5 t5 xuan k` naath t5 pusl pu1nykivn t5 ca rs kuany v kvn, la nyoothv gssy w1l kvn pek in ba th6p.

sourceString: Phase II trials are used to establish an initial reading of efficacy and further explore safety in small numbers of people having the disease targeted by the NCE.
targetString: K1th in II kv f1n w1l la g77r kvn kuen gssy`dv kv nhiam kvn f66 ba min te nhiam g7r k` pek m5 tst in ca k1n k` naath tin te kv juey in ku naath lvn l`t kv ku5cdv v NCE.

sourceString: Phase III trials are large, pivotal trials to determine safety and efficacy in sufficiently large numbers of people with the COVID-19 infection.
targetString: K1th in III lvmv, ku2ny k`th` min te nhiam kv f66 ba x1c 5 gsaayv kv r6xv kv gu11th k` naath t5 xuan t5 te kv juey luex` COVID-19.

sourceString: If safety and efficacy are adequately proved, clinical testing may stop at this step and the NCE advances to the new drug application (NDA) stage to begin marketing.
targetString: M5 ca gssydv kvn r6c]xdv nvn gswkv, ba th2m k1p cu]x kv jvn pek vmv k` b5 NCE cu we nhiam kv t1th kvn tin k]x tin dee w`l kv lvn we n66x (NDA) kv f66 bv k1th in cup kv jv k` g`pv cop.

sourceString: Phase IV trials are post-approval trials that may be a condition attached by the FDA, also called post-market surveillance studies.
targetString: K1th in IV kv f]n w1l v xot x1thdv derv la thiec in mat rs kv kv l`r FDA, min csal kv b` 5 tiit v xot /ken w`l cop k` g`pv.

sourceString: In addition to the tests required to move a novel vaccine or antiviral drug into the clinic for the first time, manufacturers must ensure that any long-term or chronic toxicities are well-defined, including effects on systems not previously monitored (fertility, reproduction, immune system, among others).
targetString: Nysk kv ksr th2m in g77r f66 ba vn w`l in rvl rs kap dv vn antibarsl k` k5l5nikn5 kv gu11th in nhiam, bv dhil cop lsscdivn vn f66 c5 kvn min dee w`l v we n66x pu]]ny ran ca kvn diaal ku2x piny, kvvl kv ji`k tin dee tussk rvi l1t t5 /ken tussk n5 wal (ciaax dap` ran, gssy civvx` dap`, bu]m pu11ny, kv` tin k]x).

sourceString: In the United States, this process is called a "new drug application" or NDA.
targetString: K` Ynaytet Y5tht2t, kvn k11th titi la csal kv jv ‘nyin w1l pay ben’ kiv NDA.

sourceString: A clinical trial design in progress may be modified as an "adaptive design" if accumulating data in the trial provide early insights about positive or negative efficacy of the treatment.
targetString: F]n w1l kv gu11th in nhiam d]x d22 jv gvr v la l1t kv ad1pcin m5 cv jssc k` k11th tin gu]]r kv vn f66 d22 m5 ji``k kiv m5 gsaa tussk kv rvi tum`.

sourceString: The global Solidarity and European Discovery trials of hospitalized people with severe COVID-19 infection apply adaptive design to rapidly alter trial parameters as results from the four experimental therapeutic strategies emerge.
targetString: Vn l1t k00l w55 mu]]n kvn ciaax Yurspin kv f]]n5 t1th w1l k` naath tin ca tom kv luex COVID-19 la kuex` c1p ad1ptib nhiam kv f66 ba p0th kv ri`t c11pn5 f]1n l1t cet kv min tussk k` k11th xuaan tin nax kv ciaax lu1k kv t1th w1l medan.

sourceString: Adaptive designs within ongoing Phase II-III clinical trials on candidate therapeutics may shorten trial durations and use fewer subjects, possibly expediting decisions for early termination or success, and coordinating design changes for a specific trial across its international locations.

sourceString: Most novel drug candidates (NCEs) fail during drug development, either because they have unacceptable toxicity or because they simply do not prove efficacy on the targeted disease, as shown in Phase II-III clinical trials.

sourceString: The high failure rates associated with pharmaceutical development are referred to as an "attrition rate", requiring decisions during the early stages of drug development to "kill" projects early to avoid costly failures.

sourceString: One 2010 study assessed both capitalized and out-of-pocket costs for bringing a single new drug to market as about US$1.8 billion and $870 million, respectively.

sourceString: In a 2016 review of 106 drug candidates assessed through clinical trials, the total capital expenditure for a manufacturer having a drug approved through successful Phase III trials was $2.6 billion (in 2013 dollars), an amount increasing at an annual rate of 8.5%.

sourceString: Seven trials were evaluating repurposed drugs already approved to treat malaria, including four studies on hydroxychloroquine or chloroquine phosphate.

sourceString: b'COVID-19 surveillance involves monitoring the spread of the coronavirus disease in order to establish the patterns of disease progression.

sourceString: b'Coronaviruses are a group of related viruses that cause diseases in mammals and birds.
targetString: b’Ksrsnabayr`thn5 kv bu]n m5 c``t t5 n66x juey k` ley caak kvn diit.

sourceString: In humans, coronaviruses cause respiratory tract infections that can range from mild to lethal.
targetString: K` naath, ksrsnabayr`th n77xv luex ju1th l55k` m5 dee ku00 k` dee d5t.

sourceString: Mild illnesses include some cases of the common cold (which has other possible causes, predominantly rhinoviruses), while more lethal varieties can cause SARS, MERS, and COVID-19.
targetString: Juey m5 tst kvvl kvn th11x thony-thony` (m5 te kv tuk d]divn , vl]x rin66bayr`th), k` min d55tdv derv SARS, MERS kvn COVID-19 n66x.

sourceString: Symptoms in other species vary: in chickens, they cause an upper respiratory tract disease, while in cows and pigs they cause diarrhea.
targetString: Nyuuthn5 kv k` kuay tin k]x gu1c kv: k` manpal00k, n77xv juey nhial l55k`, k` f]k kvn kundhur5 n77x kvn c5th.

sourceString: There are yet to be vaccines or antiviral drugs to prevent or treat human coronavirus infections.
targetString: Xot wal kiv antibayral5 tin d22 gaxv kiv d22 tom luex ksrsnabayr`th k` raan.

sourceString: Coronaviruses constitute the subfamily Orthocoronavirinae, in the family Coronaviridae, order Nidovirales, and realm Riboviria.
targetString: Ksrsnabayr`thn5 kv dhsr Srthsksrsnabay5nia, rvi dhsaar Ksrsnabayr5dia, luey N5dobayralith kvn k1th Rayb6bayria.

sourceString: They are enveloped viruses with a positive-sense single-stranded RNA genome and a nucleocapsid of helical symmetry.
targetString: Kvn kum bayr`thn5 kv kv RNAgensme kvl kvn nukvli6capthid hel5kal th5m5t5r5.

sourceString: The genome size of coronaviruses ranges from approximately 26 to 32 kilobases, one of the largest among RNA viruses.
targetString: Vn pek gensme ksrsnabayr`th thi``xv kam 26 v we k` 32 k5l6bvth, kvl m5 d55t k` RNA bayr`thn5.

sourceString: They have characteristic club-shaped spikes that project from their surface, which in electron micrographs create an image reminiscent of the solar corona from which their name derives.
targetString: Te kvn kv ciaax ks jsac luak` m5 jivn w55divn, m5 rvi mayk7r7g5r1pn5 tookv thurv m5 cet kv ksrsna c1x in b` ci66kivn th5n.

sourceString: Coronaviruses were first discovered in the 1930s when an acute respiratory infection of domesticated chickens was shown to be caused by infectious bronchitis virus (IBV).
targetString: Ksrsnabayr`thn5 n0n kv kv nhiam kv 1930 m22 ca luex l55k` manpa00k m5 rup-rup nvn 5 n77xv luex bsrsxkayt5th bayr`th (IBV).

sourceString: In the 1940s, two more animal coronaviruses, mouse hepatitis virus (MHV) and transmissible gastroenteritis virus (TGEV), were isolated.Human coronaviruses were discovered in the 1960s.
targetString: Kv 1940, rvw k` ley, bayr`th g7r` mieth k` kun (MHV) kvn bayr`th ji`c` m5 la dsap kv (TGEV), cua kv nvn. Ksrsnabayr`thn5 ran n0n kv kv kv 1960.

sourceString: The earliest ones studied were from human patients with the common cold, which were later named human coronavirus 229E and human coronavirus OC43.
targetString: T22 nhiam t22 ksax guic kv k` naath t5 j5 ju1th t5 te kv thony-thony t22 ca ben csl 5 ksrsnabayr`th ran 229E kvn ksrsnabayr`th ran AC43.

sourceString: They were first imaged by Scottish virologist June Almeida at St. Thomas Hospital in London.
targetString: Cua kv nvn kv nhiam v bayrslsj5th Yithkst n5 June Almeida du22lw1l thvnt Tsmvth k` London.

sourceString: Other human coronaviruses have since been identified, including SARS-CoV in 2003, HCoV NL63 in 2004, HKU1 in 2005, MERS-CoV in 2012, and SARS-CoV-2 in 2019.
targetString: Bayr`thn5 ran tin k]x cua kv ku we kv m5 n0n kv kv, tin te rvidivn kv SARSCoV kv 2003, HCoV NL63 kv 2004, HKU1 kv 2005 MERS-CoV k 2012, kvn SARSCoV-2 kv 2019.

sourceString: Most of these have involved serious respiratory tract infections.
targetString: R5wdivn kvn titi c5 luex ju1th l55k` n66x.

sourceString: The name was first used in 1968 by an informal group of virologists in the journal Nature to designate the new family of viruses.
targetString: Vn ci6t lar kv nhiam k` 1968 v bu]n bayrslsj5th m5 nyun-nyun rvi wargak` n2cvr kv nyu]th dhsaar bayr`thn5.

sourceString: The name refers to the characteristic appearance of virions (the infective form of the virus) by electron microscopy, which have a fringe of large, bulbous surface projections creating an image reminiscent of a crown or of a solar corona.
targetString: Vn ci6tdivn naxv rs ciaax bayri6n (kv t`` luex` bayr`th`) v ilvktsrsn mayksrsthksp5, m5 te kv bivvl t5 d5t, m5 rox-rox kv thurv thaac kiv ksrsna c1x.

sourceString: This morphology is created by the viral spike peplomers, which are proteins on the surface of the virus.

sourceString: Coronaviruses are large pleomorphic spherical particles with bulbous surface projections.

sourceString: The envelope of the virus in electron micrographs appears as a distinct pair of electron dense shells.The viral envelope consists of a lipid bilayer where the membrane (M), envelope (E) and spike (S) structural proteins are anchored.
targetString: Vn kuumdv vn bayr`th rvi ilvktsrsn mayksr6g5r11pn5 jscv v la k7tn5 rvw t5 g66l k` cok. Vn kuum bayrsl t22 kv thisl kv keer5 rvw tin g6l m`mbvr1n (M), kuum (E), kvn psrstiin luak` min d55t (S).

sourceString: The lipid bilayer envelope, membrane proteins, and nucleocapsid protect the virus when it is outside the host cell.

sourceString: Coronaviruses contain a positive-sense, single-stranded RNA genome.

sourceString: The genome size for coronaviruses ranges from 26.4 to 31.7 kilobases.

sourceString: The open reading frames 1a and 1b, which occupy the first two-thirds of the genome, encode the replicase/transcriptase polyprotein.

sourceString: Infection begins when the viral spike (S) glycoprotein attaches to its complementary host cell receptor.
targetString: Luex la tusskv min c5 luak bayrsl (S) g5layk6psrstiin rv dsap th0l l== in payv jek gu22r.

sourceString: After attachment, a protease of the host cell cleaves and activates the receptor-attached spike protein.

sourceString: Depending on the host cell protease available, cleavage and activation allows the virus to enter the host cell by endocytosis or direct fusion of the viral envelop with the host membrane.On entry into the host cell, the virus particle is uncoated, and its genome enters the cell cytoplasm.
targetString: K` t11 psrstiaath th0l` l== v thi`ks, thieek kvn l1t bv bayr`th cu jak` we rvi th0l` l== kv ind6thayt6thith kiv kv r6m m5 civk kvn kuum bayrsl kvn m`mbvr1n l==. Kv wedv rvc k` ley, vn p`rt5ksl bayrsl ba pusth, k` gensmednv bv cu coth k` th0l thayt6p5l1thdh5m.

sourceString: The host ribosome translates the initial overlapping open reading frame of the virus genome and forms a long polyprotein.

sourceString: The polyprotein has its own proteases which cleave the polyprotein into multiple nonstructural proteins.

sourceString: A number of the nonstructural proteins coalesce to form a multi-protein replicase-transcriptase complex (RTC).

sourceString: The main replicase-transcriptase protein is the RNA-dependent RNA polymerase (RdRp).

sourceString: It is directly involved in the replication and transcription of RNA from an RNA strand.

sourceString: The other nonstructural proteins in the complex assist in the replication and transcription process.

sourceString: The exoribonuclease nonstructural protein, for instance, provides extra fidelity to replication by providing a proofreading function which the RNA-dependent RNA polymerase lacks.One of the main functions of the complex is to replicate the viral genome.
targetString: Vn ikdhraybsnuk5livth psrstiin in thil n2n mi com, jvn n77xv gssy luc` m5 d]x kv n77xdv kv l1t gssy` kuen` min cux RNA jskdv min thil RNA psl5mvr`th. Kvl k` l`t ksmp5l=k in d55t v lu]c gensme bayrsl`.

sourceString: RdRp directly mediates the synthesis of negative-sense genomic RNA from the positive-sense genomic RNA.

sourceString: This is followed by the replication of positive-sense genomic RNA from the negative-sense genomic RNA.

sourceString: The other important function of the complex is to transcribe the viral genome.

sourceString: This is followed by the transcription of these negative-sense subgenomic RNA molecules to their corresponding positive-sense mRNAs.

sourceString: There, the M proteins direct most protein-protein interactions required for assembly of viruses following its binding to the nucleocapsid.

sourceString: The interaction of the coronavirus spike protein with its complement host cell receptor is central in determining the tissue tropism, infectivity, and species range of the virus.

sourceString: The SARS coronavirus, for example, infects human cells by attaching to the angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) receptor.

sourceString: The scientific name for coronavirus is Orthocoronavirinae or Coronavirinae.

sourceString: The most recent common ancestor (MRCA) of all coronaviruses is estimated to have existed as recently as 8000 BCE, although some models place the common ancestor as far back as 55 million years or more, implying long term coevolution with bat and avian species.
targetString: Gu1ndssxdivn in pay jek (MRCA) kvn bayr`thn5 diaal ca jv diw 5 t22 th5n n5 kv gu11th thi1kv kv 8000BCE, c`x min l`th th11x guec jv 5 gu1ndssxdivn diaal t22 th5n n5 kv run t5 bathdssr5 t5 55 kiv v we nhiam, nyooth lu]c m5 c5 gu11th nax k` xap kvn kuay din.

sourceString: The most recent common ancestor of the alphacoronavirus line has been placed at about 2400 BCE, the betacoronavirus line at 3300 BCE, the gammacoronavirus line at 2800 BCE, and the deltacoronavirus line at about 3000 BCE.
targetString: Keer gu1ndssx alphaksrsnabar`thn5 diaal ca jv l1th k` 2400 BCE, vn keet betaksrsnabayr`th t22 th5n kv 3300 BCE, vn keer gammaksrsnabayr`th t22 th5n kv 2800 BCE, k` keer deltaksrsnabayr`th t22 th5n kv 3000 BCE.

sourceString: The large number of host bat and avian species, and their global range, has enabled extensive evolution and dissemination of coronaviruses.Many human coronavirus have their origin in bats.

sourceString: More recently, alpaca coronavirus and human coronavirus 229E diverged sometime before 1960.

sourceString: MERS-CoV emerged in humans from bats through the intermediate host of camels.

sourceString: MERS-CoV, although related to several bat coronavirus species, appears to have diverged from these several centuries ago.

sourceString: The most closely related bat coronavirus and SARS-CoV diverged in 1986.

sourceString: A possible path of evolution, of SARS coronavirus and keen bat coronaviruses, suggests that SARS related coronaviruses coevolved in bats for a long time.

sourceString: In the 1790s, equine coronavirus diverged from the bovine coronavirus after a cross-species jump.

sourceString: Later in the 1890s, human coronavirus OC43 diverged from bovine coronavirus after another cross-species spillover event.

sourceString: It is speculated that the flu pandemic of 1890 may have been caused by this spillover event, and not by the influenza virus, because of the related timing, neurological symptoms, and unknown causative agent of the pandemic.
targetString: Cua jv diw 5 vn piluu e c5 fsw thi`x kv 1890 d]x n77xv jvn rarv fsaa vmv, k` /c5 ms a yinp5luvndha bayr`th, kv ku5c c`t` gu1th, nyuuthn5 r``l, kvn du]]r m5 ku1c kv min thi``x fsw.

sourceString: Human coronavirus OC43 besides causing respiratory infections is also suspected of playing a role in neurological diseases.

sourceString: In the 1950s, the human coronavirus OC43 began to diverge into its present genotypes.

sourceString: Phylogentically, mouse hepatitis virus (Murine coronavirus), which infects the mouse's liver and the central nervous system, is related to  human coronavirus OC43 and bovine coronavirus.

sourceString: Human coronavirus HKU1, like the aforementioned viruses, also has its origins in rodents.
